snippet: Efforts in Washington State to address a resurgent childhood ailment have been hobbled by years of recession-induced budget cuts that have hollowed out public health departments.
abstract: Efforts in Washington State to address a resurgent epidemic of whooping cough have been hobbled by years of recession-induced budget cuts that have reduced staff and eliminated preventive care programs at public health departments.
lead_paragraph: Efforts in Washington State to address a resurgent childhood ailment have been hobbled by years of recession-induced budget cuts that have hollowed out public health departments.

headline.seo: Whooping Cough Epidemic Hits Washington State
headline.main: Cutbacks Hurt a State’s Response to Whooping Cough
headline.print_headline: Budget Cuts Hurt Washington State’s Response to Whooping Cough Outbreak

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
